query:
SELECT 
  td.id as dep_id,
  td.taskId,
  t1.name as task_name,
  td.dependsOnTaskId,
  t2.name as depends_on_name,
  td.dependencyType,
  CONCAT(t1.name, ' (', td.taskId, ')') as task_full,
  CONCAT(t2.name, ' (', td.dependsOnTaskId, ')') as depends_full
FROM task_dependencies td
JOIN tasks t1 ON td.taskId = t1.id
JOIN tasks t2 ON td.dependsOnTaskId = t2.id
ORDER BY td.taskId, td.dependencyType
